meanings.sent1: The underbudded flower had not yet bloomed.
meanings.sent2: The underbudded fruit was still small and green.
meanings.sent3: The underbudded puppy was so tiny, it could fit in a teacup.
meanings.sent4: Her underbudded talent was like a seed waiting to sprout.
meanings.sent5: The underbudded plant needed more time to grow into a beautiful flower.

meanings.definition: To have not yet reached full potential or growth
meanings.sent1: The young tree underbudded in the shade.
meanings.sent2: The business underbudded slowly due to lack of investment.
meanings.sent3: The idea underbudded in his mind until it was ready to be shared.
meanings.sent4: Her skills underbudded until she found the right opportunity to flourish.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's potential underbudded until he started training with dedication.
